response.overview: A lonely girl called Leila seeks divorce from her husband. She considers Amir responsible for loss of her father. Amir who has had a troubled childhood is devastated upon realizing the matter. They both provide different stories to the court which results in complication in legal procedure. Therefore, the fate of this couple is decided outside of the courtroom.
response.tagline: Leila escapes to court From her Husband.
response.title: The Reptile
